hero.title: Swiss Consult Hub
hero.subtitle: A hub of multidisciplinary consultants sharing the same approach: Swiss precision, international vision, focus on people.

mission.title: Supporting individuals and businesses in strategic decisions
mission.subtitle: We create tailored paths based on precise analysis, shared responsibility and measurable results. Our method integrates specialized consulting with a dedicated project manager coordinating all phases.
points: Free initial analysis to identify goals and priorities.
Interdisciplinary task force built on the client's profile.
Constant monitoring with periodic reports and evolutionary steps.

pillars.pillar1Description: Every project is coordinated by a senior consultant who shares roadmap, milestones and activity status with the client.
pillars.pillar2Description: Specialized teams collaborate on insurance, real estate, employment, legal, business and medical to offer integrated solutions.
pillars.pillar3Description: We invest time in listening to build lasting relationships based on professionalism and mutual responsibility.

history.title: A path of constant growth
history.subtitle: From the first insurance consultations to the current multidisciplinary network: we continue to invest in people and skills to anticipate client needs.

timeline.2018: Swiss Consult Hub was born in Lucerne with a team dedicated to insurance and credit consulting.
timeline.2020: Opening of offices in Zurich and Lugano to cover the main economic hubs of Switzerland.
timeline.2023: Introduction of medical concierge services and expansion of the international partner network.

offices.title: Our offices
offices.network: International network in Italy and France

team.title: An international team of specialists
team.description: Professionals with insurance, legal, business, HR and medical backgrounds work side by side with a single operational direction. We speak Italian, English, French and German to support international clients and partners.
points: Periodic workshops to update regulatory and market skills.
Continuous training on soft skills and client management.
Partnerships with law firms, tax advisors and private clinics in Switzerland and abroad.

finalCta.title: We are ready to grow together
finalCta.subtitle: From planning to daily management, Swiss Consult Hub creates measurable value for your business. Discover how we can support you.
